THE_GARDEN().notice: Address of the public DAO, aka the garden

THE_STEWARD().notice: Address of the protocol owner multisig, aka the steward

boxOfficeContract().notice: Address of the Box Office contract that can interact with the vault

pendingPayouts(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to track pending payouts in Ether for each show and wallet address

pendingRefunds(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping from showId to wallet addresses to pending refunds in Ether

pendingTokenPayouts(bytes32,address,addr.notice: Mapping to track pending payouts in ERC20 tokens for each show and wallet address

pendingTokenRefunds(bytes32,address,addr.notice: Mapping from showId and token address to wallet addresses to pending token refunds

showContract().notice: Address of the Show contract that can interact with the vault

showInstance().notice: Interface instance of the IShow contract

showPaymentTokens(bytes32).notice: Mapping to track the payment token for each show

showTokenVault(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping from showId and token address to its accumulated ERC20 token balance

showVault(bytes32).notice: Mapping from showId to its accumulated ether balance
